item.title: Capture may not be working as expected
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Issue with Dropbox capture files

Summary: The links to Dropbox capture files may not be working as expected. The issue has been identified, and a fix is being implemented.

Feb 26, 00:07 UTC
Investigating - Links to Dropbox capture files may not be working as expected

Feb 25, 23:44 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

item.title: Scheduled maintenance
item.content:encoded:
```html [Medium] - Routine Maintenance Summary: Dropbox will undergo routine maintenance on March 12, 2024 at 5:00 PM (Pacific). Access may be temporarily limited, but disruption will be minimized. ```

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 13, 00:00 - 01:00 UTC

Mar 13, 00:00 UTC
Scheduled - Dropbox will be performing routine maintenance on March 12, 2024 starting at 5:00 PM (Pacific). You may not be able to access Dropbox for a short period of time, but we’ll have things back up and running as soon as possible to minimize disruption to you.
